data.partBlankContent: With so many resources available for teachers today, the sky is the limit for creativity in the classroom. I chal_____ you t_ expand yo__ student's minds. Press th__ to s__ perspectives big___ than thems_____. Being crea____ might ta__ more ti__ to pl__, but t__ end pro____ will b_ well wo___ it. Who knows, you might even learn something new yourself.
data.answer: 如今，教师可以获得如此多的资源，教室里的创造力是无限的。我希望你能拓展学生的思维。让他们看得比自己更长远。有创意可能需要更多的时间来计划，但最终的产品是非常值得的。谁知道呢，说不定你自己也能学到新东西呢。
